title: HINE Cognac Masterclass at Club Mareva Beirut

content.raw:
Last night, June 19, Club Mareva Beirut had the pleasure of hosting an exceptional Cognac masterclass in collaboration with HINE Cognac—a house renowned for its finesse, history, and dedication to craft.

Led by Nicolas Loisier, Global Brand Ambassador of HINE, the evening unfolded into a sensorial journey through time, terroir, and tradition. Guests were treated to an exclusive tasting of some of the maison’s most celebrated expressions, including:

  • HINE VSOP – Elegant and vibrant, a wonderful introduction to the house’s delicate style.

  • HINE Rare – A balanced and floral cognac, expressing the complexity of over 20 eaux-de-vie.

  • HINE XO – Rich, deep, and velvety—showcasing the art of extended aging.

  • Bonneuil 2006, 2008, and 2010 – Single-estate vintages that offered a rare glimpse into the subtleties of time and harvest.

The ambiance was intimate and warm, filled with insightful conversation, refined palates, and a shared appreciation for the artistry behind each pour. From the moment guests walked in, guided by the signature elegance of Club Mareva, to the final toast of Bonneuil 2010, the night celebrated craftsmanship in its purest form.

This masterclass was not just about Cognac—it was about storytelling, connection, and elevating the experience of tasting into a celebration of heritage and discovery.

A special thank you to G-Vincenti & Sons for making this evening possible and to all those who joined us in making it unforgettable.

Stay tuned for more curated experiences at Club Mareva Beirut—where fine spirits and fine cigars always meet.
